Function reference

All functions

calculate_masked_grid_stats()
Calculate Stats of Variable for Geographical Subset of a Grid

Check Local Availability or Download Shape Files

Convert Binary Radolan File to Raster File
coordinates_to_EPSG_4326()
Coordinates to EPSG-4326
crop_radolan_radial()
Crop Radolan Data
download_radolan()
Download Radolan Files on DWD Server
dwd_files
Files Available on DWD's FTP Server
extract_radolan_zip_files()
Extract radolan zip files
find_description_files()
For a Given URL, Try to Find Description Files
get_berlin_dwd_mask()
Get geographical "stamp" for Berlin area
get_dwd_urls_metadata()
Get URLs to DWD Metadata
get_example_grid_germany()
Read an Example Raster File for Germany
get_radolan_extension()
Get Radolan Extension
get_radolan_projection_string()
Compose radolan projection string
get_radolan_urls()
Get URLs to Available Radolan Files
get_shapes_of_germany()
Provide List of SpatialPolygonsDataFrame for Germany
list_monthly_grids_germany_asc_gz()
Get URLs to Monthly Grids in Zipped ESRI-ascii-grid Format
list_url()
List Files or Folders in a FTP Directory
load_potential_evaporation_berlin()
Load monthly potential evaporation for Berlin from DWD
load_potential_evaporation_berlin_2()
New Version of Reading Potential Evaporation for Berlin
load_precipitation_berlin()
Load monthly precipitation for Berlin from DWD
open_description()
Open Description for DWD Record in Web Browser
radolan_raw_to_raster()
Radolan raw to raster
read_asc_gz_file()
Read Zipped ESRI-Ascii-Grid File (from URL)
read_binary_radolan_file()
Read Binary Radolan File
read_daily_data_over_shape()
Read daily data from DWD, mask region with given shape file
read_relevant_years_radolan()
Reads Relevant Radolan Data from rst Database
select_shapes()
Interactively Configure Selection of SpatialPolygons
select_variable()
Let User Select a Column from a SpatialPolygonsDataFrame
unzip_asc_gz_file()
Download a .gz File and Unzip it
write_raster_to_file()
Write raster to file
